parameters.name: KeyWord
parameters.description: The email address. The length is 1 to 60 characters. It supports digits, letters, periods (.), hyphens (-), and at signs (@).

parameters.name: PageNo
parameters.description: The current page number. The default value is 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. The default value is 10.

parameters.name: Sendtype
parameters.description:
The type of the sender address. Valid values:

- batch: batch emails

- trigger: triggered emails
